Name: Login with valid credentials
Description: Test user login with valid username and password
Steps: 1. Open login page|2. Enter valid username|3. Enter valid password|4. Click login button
Expected Result: User should be logged in successfully
Preconditions: User account exists and is active

Name: Login with invalid credentials
Description: Test user login with invalid credentials
Steps: 1. Open login page|2. Enter invalid username|3. Enter invalid password|4. Click login button

Name: Password reset functionality
Steps: 1. Click forgot password|2. Enter email address|3. Submit request|4. Check email|5. Click reset link|6. Enter new password|7. Confirm password|8. Submit

Name: User profile update
Steps: 1. Navigate to profile page|2. Edit profile fields|3. Save changes|4. Verify updates

Name: Create new project
Description: Create a new project with basic information
Steps: 1. Navigate to projects|2. Click create project|3. Fill project details|4. Set permissions|5. Save project

Name: Delete project
Steps: 1. Navigate to project list|2. Select project|3. Click delete|4. Confirm deletion
Preconditions: Project exists and user has delete permissions

Name: Edit project settings
Steps: 1. Open project settings|2. Modify configuration|3. Update permissions|4. Save changes|5. Verify settings

Name: Add team member
Description: Add new team member to project
Steps: 1. Go to team section|2. Click add member|3. Enter member details|4. Set role|5. Send invitation
Expected Result: Member should be added to team

Name: Remove team member
Description: Remove existing team member from project
Steps: 1. Go to team section|2. Find member|3. Click remove|4. Confirm removal

Name: Change member role
Description: Change role of existing team member
Steps: 1. Navigate to team|2. Select member|3. Change role|4. Save changes

Name: Create test case
Description: Create new test case with detailed steps
Steps: 1. Navigate to test cases|2. Click create|3. Fill test details|4. Add test steps|5. Set expected results|6. Save test case

Name: Edit test case
Steps: 1. Find test case|2. Click edit|3. Modify details|4. Update steps|5. Save changes

Name: Delete test case
Steps: 1. Select test case|2. Click delete|3. Confirm deletion
Preconditions: Test case exists and user has permissions

Name: Copy test case
Description: Create copy of existing test case
Steps: 1. Select test case|2. Click copy|3. Modify copied case|4. Save as new
Expected Result: New test case copy should be created

Name: Export test cases
Description: Export test cases to CSV format
Steps: 1. Navigate to test cases|2. Select cases|3. Click export|4. Choose CSV format|5. Download file

Name: Import test cases
Description: Import test cases from CSV file
Steps: 1. Navigate to import|2. Select CSV file|3. Map fields|4. Preview data|5. Confirm import

Name: Run test suite
Steps: 1. Create test run|2. Select test suite|3. Assign testers|4. Execute tests|5. Review results

Name: Mark test as passed
Steps: 1. Open test run|2. Select test|3. Mark as passed|4. Add comments
Expected Result: Test should be marked as passed

Name: Mark test as failed
Steps: 1. Open test run|2. Select test|3. Mark as failed|4. Add failure reason|5. Attach evidence
Expected Result: Test should be marked as failed

Name: Create test run report
Steps: 1. Navigate to reports|2. Select test run|3. Choose report type|4. Configure options|5. Generate report

Name: Schedule automated tests
Steps: 1. Navigate to automation|2. Select test suite|3. Set schedule|4. Configure parameters|5. Save schedule

Name: API authentication test
Steps: 1. Send login request|2. Verify token|3. Test protected endpoints|4. Validate responses
Expected Result: All API auth tests should pass

Name: API data validation
Steps: 1. Send various requests|2. Validate response schemas|3. Check data types|4. Verify required fields

Name: Database connection test
Steps: 1. Connect to database|2. Execute test queries|3. Measure response time|4. Verify data integrity
Expected Result: Database should be accessible and performant

Name: File upload functionality
Description: Test file upload with various formats
Steps: 1. Select file|2. Upload file|3. Verify upload|4. Check file integrity|5. Test file access

Name: File download test
Steps: 1. Navigate to files|2. Select file|3. Click download|4. Verify download

Name: Search functionality
Steps: 1. Enter search query|2. Execute search|3. Review results|4. Test filters|5. Verify relevance

Name: Advanced search filters
Description: Test advanced search with multiple filters
Steps: 1. Access advanced search|2. Set multiple filters|3. Execute search|4. Verify filtered results

Name: Notification system
Steps: 1. Trigger notification event|2. Check notification display|3. Test notification actions|4. Mark as read

Name: Email notifications
Steps: 1. Trigger email event|2. Check email delivery|3. Verify email content|4. Test email links
Expected Result: Emails should be sent and received

Name: Performance under load
Description: Test application performance under high load
Steps: 1. Setup load test|2. Generate concurrent users|3. Monitor performance|4. Analyze bottlenecks|5. Generate report

Name: Memory usage monitoring
Steps: 1. Start memory profiler|2. Execute test scenarios|3. Monitor memory usage|4. Identify leaks|5. Generate report
Expected Result: Memory usage should be within limits

Name: Security vulnerability scan
Steps: 1. Run security scanner|2. Analyze results|3. Categorize vulnerabilities|4. Generate security report
Expected Result: No critical vulnerabilities should be found

Name: Cross-browser compatibility
Steps: 1. Test on Chrome|2. Test on Firefox|3. Test on Safari|4. Test on Edge|5. Compare functionality
Expected Result: App should work consistently across browsers

Name: Mobile responsiveness
Steps: 1. Open on mobile|2. Test navigation|3. Test touch interactions|4. Test orientation changes|5. Verify layout

Name: Accessibility compliance
Steps: 1. Run accessibility audit|2. Test keyboard navigation|3. Test screen reader|4. Check color contrast|5. Generate report

Name: Data export large dataset
Description: Export large amount of data to various formats
Steps: 1. Select large dataset|2. Choose export format|3. Initiate export|4. Monitor progress|5. Verify exported data

Name: Data import validation
Steps: 1. Prepare import file|2. Start import process|3. Monitor progress|4. Validate imported data|5. Check for errors

Name: Backup and restore
Description: Test system backup and restore functionality
Steps: 1. Initiate backup|2. Verify backup integrity|3. Simulate data loss|4. Restore from backup|5. Verify data integrity
Expected Result: System should backup and restore successfully

Name: User session timeout
Steps: 1. Login to application|2. Wait for timeout period|3. Try to access protected resource|4. Verify session expired
Expected Result: User should be logged out after timeout

Name: Password complexity validation
Steps: 1. Try weak passwords|2. Try strong passwords|3. Verify validation messages|4. Test password requirements
Expected Result: Only strong passwords should be accepted

Name: Two-factor authentication
Description: Test two-factor authentication setup and usage
Steps: 1. Enable 2FA|2. Setup authenticator|3. Login with 2FA|4. Test backup codes|5. Disable 2FA

Name: Audit log verification
Description: Verify audit log captures all user actions
Steps: 1. Perform various actions|2. Check audit log|3. Verify log entries|4. Test log filtering|5. Export logs

Name: Integration with third-party API
Description: Test integration with external API service
Steps: 1. Configure API connection|2. Test API calls|3. Handle API responses|4. Test error scenarios|5. Monitor API usage

Name: Webhook functionality
Steps: 1. Setup webhook endpoint|2. Configure webhook source|3. Send test payload|4. Verify processing|5. Handle errors

Name: Cache performance
Steps: 1. Measure uncached performance|2. Enable caching|3. Measure cached performance|4. Test cache invalidation|5. Monitor cache hit ratio

Name: Database query optimization
Description: Optimize and test database query performance
Steps: 1. Identify slow queries|2. Optimize query structure|3. Add database indexes|4. Measure performance improvement|5. Load test optimized queries

Name: Concurrent user testing
Description: Test application with multiple concurrent users
Steps: 1. Setup concurrent user simulation|2. Execute user scenarios|3. Monitor system resources|4. Check for race conditions|5. Generate performance report
Expected Result: System should handle concurrent users gracefully
